commit.message:
Switch to aka.ms link for BinaryFormatter warning

This is more future-proof than the fixed link we had before.

nodes.body: In general we should use aka.ms links for user-facing messages. They can be redirected more easily then direct learn.ms links, and are less likely to go stale when using not-the-latest tooling.
Yeah, I wanted to change the destination to the .NET 8-specific deprecation page . . . but I couldn't because it wasn't indirected. So I did both in one shot :)
